meta.name: Monitor Stock Market with AI: News Analysis & Multi-Channel Alerts via Slack & Telegram

messages.content: You are a financial analyst AI. Analyze news articles and provide: 1) Market Sentiment (Bullish/Neutral/Bearish/Crisis), 2) Impact Level (Low/Medium/High/Critical), 3) Affected Sectors (list), 4) Trading Signal (Strong Buy/Buy/Hold/Sell/Strong Sell), 5) Confidence Score (0-100), 6) Key Catalyst (brief explanation), 7) Risk Factors. Return as JSON only.

You are a portfolio strategist. Based on the trading signal and market conditions, provide: 1) Position sizing recommendation (% of portfolio), 2) Entry strategy (market/limit/staged), 3) Stop loss level, 4) Take profit targets, 5) Time horizon. Return as JSON.

parameters.content: Triggers the workflow automatically every 15 minutes.
Fetches latest market news via RSS.
Combines all fetched RSS feeds into one stream.
Filters recent news, extracts tickers and keywords.
Uses AI to analyze market sentiment and impact.
Pulls stock prices and volumes from Yahoo Finance.
Merges AI and stock data into insights.
Keeps only strong or high-confidence trade signals.
Sends detailed trading alerts to Slack channel.
Sends condensed trade alerts to Telegram mobile app.
Stores analyzed signals in Airtable database.
Logs each trade‚Äôs data into Google Sheets.
Creates AI-driven strategy with entry and exit plan.
Updates Airtable record with full trading strategy JSON.

# üß† AI-Powered Market Intelligence & Trading Signal Workflow

This automated workflow continuously monitors financial news sources ‚Äî Bloomberg, CNBC, and Reuters ‚Äî every 15 minutes. It aggregates market data, filters relevant stories, and extracts stock symbols and market-moving keywords using NLP.

The system then runs **AI sentiment analysis** on the filtered headlines to assess potential market impact. It cross-references this information with **real-time stock data** from Yahoo Finance to identify actionable trading opportunities.

Each insight is compiled into a structured **intelligence report**, logged in Airtable and Google Sheets for tracking performance. When a strong signal appears, the system instantly sends alerts to **Slack** (detailed summary) and **Telegram** (mobile notification), ensuring no key move is missed.

Finally, it generates a dynamic, AI-driven **trading strategy** that includes suggested entry and exit points ‚Äî updating automatically as new data comes in.


üíº **Connect with me on LinkedIn:** [Daniel Shashko](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-shashko)
